entry.title: U.S. Warns of Imminent Russian Invasion of Ukraine With Tanks, Jets, Cyber Attacks
entry.content: Prospects for averting war appear dim, officials said, even as the Biden administration is working to arrange new talks with Russia.

entry.title: Afghan Economy Further Imperiled by U.S. Move to Split Assets
entry.content: The Biden administration’s decision to effectively seize the Afghan central bank’s foreign reserves was to help address Afghanistan’s humanitarian crisis while the litigation by the 9/11 victims’ families continues. But many Afghans see the decision as a betrayal of their country, saying those funds weren’t the U.S.’s to keep or spend in the first place.
